description:
Even on biting cold winter days, the Swisswool Piz Vial Jacket and Vest keep ski tourers on track. With their full coverage 90g/m² lining and an ideal weight-to-insulation ratio, they are the warmest swisswool items in the ski touring collection – and thanks to the noticeable mountain peak quilting probably the coolest, too. Their innovative pertex® quantum diamond fuse outer material consists of a thick-knit diamond-shaped yarn made from 100 % recycled polyamide and is windproof, water-resistant, breathable and extraordinarily robust.

The active, ergonomic and at the same time casual cut provides maximum freedom of movement. The jackets and vests are equipped with a high collar and elasticated inserts on the cuffs and armholes to combat the icy air in the mountains. Of course, the swisswool piz vial line is also climate-neutral and PFC-free.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Piz Vial Jacket - Mens
